page.title: 16RELIGION-ALDWICK FREE CHURCH
page.content: Aldwick Free Church belongs to the Baptist denomination.It was built by Reverend Johnson in 1938,and has later additions,including a hall behind the church.The minister is the Reverend M.Woosley.The Reverend Woosley is assisted by a group of elected deacons.The main Sunday services are Morning and Evening Prayer.The Eucharist is celebrated twice a month.The main features of the church are the Pulpit and the Baptismal Pool.Admission to membership is by Baptism,which is total immersion,and a public statement that the baptised has accepted Christ as their personal saviour.Church organisations include Care of the Elderly and Sick,Youth work and Missionary work.
